7.27b

GENERAL

  • The following items can no longer be disassembled: Abyssal Blade, Mjollnir, Silver Edge and Solar Crest.

ITEMS

ECHO SABRE
  • Can now be disassembled
VEIL OF DISCORD
  • Can now be applied on invulnerable units
MONKEY KING BAR
  • Recipe cost increased from 350 to 550
ORCHID MALEVOLENCE
  • Attack speed reduced from 30 to 25
HAND OF MIDAS
  • Recipe cost reduced from 1850 to 1750

HEROES

ABADDON
  • Base health regen increased from 0 to 0.5
MIST COIL
  • Mist Coil cast range increased from 500 to 575
TALENTS
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +70 Damage to +80
  • Level 25 Talent increased from 340 AoE Mist Coil to 375
ALCHEMIST
UNSTABLE CONCOCTION
  • Unstable Concoction radius increased from 200 to 250
TALENTS
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +350 Unstable Concoction to +400
  • Level 25 Talent increased from +40 Chemical Rage Regen to +50
ANCIENT APPARITION
ICE VORTEX
  • Ice Vortex manacost reduced from 40/60/80/100 to 40/55/70/85
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +140 Chilling Touch Attack Range to +175
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +65 Chilling Touch Damage to +70
ANTI-MAGE
  • Agility gain reduced from 3 to 2.8
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +10 Strength to +9
  • Level 25 Talent increased from -45s Mana Void Cooldown to -50s
ARC WARDEN
  • Base armor increased by 1
  • Agility from 15 + 2.4 to 16 + 2.5
SPARK WRAITH
  • Spark Wraith duration reduced from 50 to 45
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +6% Cooldown Reduction to +350 Flux Cast Range
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +30 Attack Speed to +200 Health
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +325 Flux Cast Range to +15% Cooldown Reduction
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +250 Health to +50 Attack Speed
AXE
CULLING BLADE
  • Culling Blade kill threshold increased from 250/325/400 to 250/350/450

  • Level 10 Talent changed from +8 Strength to +25 Attack Speed
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +35 Attack Speed to Attacking Procs Counter Helix
  • Level 20 Talent changed from Attacking Procs Counter Helix to +150 Culling Blade Threshold

  • Base attributes reduced from 23 to 22
BRAIN SAP
  • Brain Sap mana cost increased from 90/115/140/165 to 110/130/150/170

  • Level 15 Talent increased from +7% Spell Amplification to +9%
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from +40 Movement Speed to +30
BATRIDER
  • Agility gain increased from 1.5 to 1.8
STICKY NAPALM
  • Sticky Napalm turn rate slow reduced from 70% to 40/50/60/70%
FLAMING LASSO
  • Flaming Lasso scepter secondary target range increased from 450 to 550
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +2s Flamebreak Burn Duration to +5 Sticky Napalm Damage
  • Level 25 Talent increased from -8s Flamebreak Cooldown to -10s
BEASTMASTER
CALL OF THE WILD BOAR
  • Call of the Wild Boar manacost increased from 50 to 60/65/70/75
WILD AXES
  • Wild Axes manacost reduced from 80/85/90/95 to 80
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent changed from -14s Hawks Cooldown to +200 Hawk Vision
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +400 Health to +450
  • Level 25 Talent increased from +80 Wild Axes Damage to +100
BLOODSEEKER
  • Intelligence increased from 18 + 1.7 to 21 + 2.0
BLOODRAGE
  • Bloodrage has been reworked. Increases your attack speed by 50/80/110/140 and your spell amplification by 6/12/18/24%. Drains 2.4/2.6/2.8/3% max health per second. Self or ally hero cast (provides half attack speed for allies). Lasts 8 seconds. Cooldown 14/12/10/8. Manacost 25/30/35/40. Not lethal.
  • Bloodrage can now be cast without interrupting movement
THIRST
  • Thirst no longer grants attack speed.
  • Thirst now provides 6/9/12/15% of max health as a heal for creep kills and 12/18/24/30% for hero kills. Grants half healing if you are within 300 radius of a dying enemy creep or hero.
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +5 Armor to +6
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +20 Attack Speed to +30 Bloodrage Attack Speed
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +60 Blood Rite Damage to +75
BOUNTY HUNTER
  • Base mana regeneration increased from 0 to 0.5
  • Damage spread reduced from 48-62 to 51-59
TRACK
  • Track manacost reduced from 65 to 60
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +20 Damage to +40 Jinada Damage
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +15 Movement Speed to +20
BREWMASTER
THUNDER CLAP
  • Thunder Clap no longer has a separate value for creeps
CINDER BREW
  • Cinder Brew manacost reduced from 80 to 50/60/70/80
  • Cinder Brew damage rescaled from 100/160/220/280 to 75/150/225/300
  • Cinder Brew backswing animation time reduced (from 0.67 to 0.4)
PRIMAL SPLIT
  • Primal Split Earth movement speed increased from 325 to 330/350/370
  • Primal Split Storm attack damage increased from 20/40/60 to 30/50/70
  • Primal Split Storm mana capacity increased from 500/750/750 to 900
  • Primal Split Fire attack backswing animation time reduced (from 0.57 to 0.3)
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +150 HP to +175
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +140% Drunken Brawler to +120%
BROODMOTHER
  • Agility gain increased from 2.8 to 3.2
INCAPACITATING BITE
  • Incapacitating Bite slow increased from 16/26/36/46% to 20/30/40/50%
SPAWN SPIDERLINGS
  • Spawn Spiderlings health increased from 280 to 320
  • Spawn Spiderlings magic resistance reduced from 40% to 25%
CENTAUR WARRUNNER
RETALIATE
  • Retaliate no longer has an active component that provides attack damage
  • Retaliate now also returns 20/25/30/35% of your strength as damage
  • Retaliate base damage reduced from 16/36/56/76 to 15/30/45/60
  • Retaliate now does half damage to towers instead of full
DOUBLE EDGE
  • Double Edge cooldown reduced from 5 to 4
HOOF STOMP
  • Hoof Stomp cooldown reduced from 22/19/16/13 to 15/14/13/12
  • Hoof Stomp damage increased from 80/110/140/170 to 100/150/200/250
  • Hoof Stomp stun duration reduced from 2/2.25/2.5/2.75 to 1.7/2.0/2.3/2.6
  • Hoof Stomp manacost reduced from 115/120/125/130 to 100/110/120/130
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +25 Base Damage to +40 Damage
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from +70 Retaliate Damage to +50
CHAOS KNIGHT
CHAOS STRIKE
  • Chaos Strike now has a 30% chance to proc instead of using a cooldown
PHANTASM
  • Phantasm cooldown reduced from 125 to 75
  • Phantasm illusion count reduced from 3 to 1/2/3
  • Phantasm illusion outgoing damage increased from 40/70/100% to 100%
  • Phantasm illusions no longer have an extra 25% magic resistance
  • Phantasm manacost reduced from 125/200/275 to 75/125/175
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +12% Cooldown Reduction to +14%
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +1.5 Max Chaos Bolt Duration to +1s Min/Max Chaos Bolt Duration
  • Level 25 Talent changed from -1.5s Chaos Strike Cooldown to +10% Chaos Strike Chance
CLINKZ
  • Intelligence gain increased from 1.7 to 2.2
  • Attack point improved from 0.7 to 0.4
SEARING ARROWS
  • Searing Arrows damage increased from 25/35/45/55 to 30/40/50/60
  • Searing Arrows manacost increased from 9/10/11/12 to 12
STRAFE
  • Strafe is a basic ability again. Grants 110/140/170/200 attack speed and 100% evasion against ranged attackers. Lasts 3/4/5/6 seconds. Cooldown 34/30/26/22. Manacost 40/50/60/70.
SKELETON WALK
  • Skeleton Walk now provides invisibility and 15/30/45/60% movement speed. Does not end invisibility when casting his spells. Lasts 25/30/35/40 seconds. Cooldown 20/19/18/17 seconds.
BURNING ARMY
  • Burning Army is now a scepter ability. Summons 5 skeletons in a 1300 line. Skeletons have 1000 health, but die in 2 hits and deals 30% of your damage. Cooldown 90, Manacost 150.
DEATH PACT
  • Death Pact has been reworked and is now his ultimate. Consumes a target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percentage of its hit points as max health and damage. Gains 6/10/14% of the target's current health as damage, and gains 60/80/100% as health. Lasts 65. Cooldown 80/70/60. Manacost 100. Cast Range 900.
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +9 Strength to +1.75 Mana Regen
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +7 Agility to Skeleton Walk Exit Summons 1 Burning Army Skeleton
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +12 Searing Arrows Damage to +25
  • Level 15 Talent changed from -30s Burning Army Cooldown to -10s Skeleton Walk Cooldown
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +100 Attack Range to +125 Attack Range
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +325 Death Pact Health to Kills Reset Death Pact Cooldown
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +3s Skeleton Walk Attack Speed to +50/5% Death Pact Health/Damage
CLOCKWERK
ROCKET FLARE
  • Rocket Flare vision duration reduced from 10 to 8 seconds

  • Level 25 Talent decreased from +350 Waning Rift AoE and Range to +300

  • Base health regen increased from 1 to 2
  • Strength gain reduced from 4 to 3.2

  • Rot slow increased from 11/18/24/32% to 14/20/26/32%

  • Strength gain reduced from 2.3 to 2.2

  • Shadow Strike manacost increased from 110 to 110/120/130/140
  • Shadow Strike initial damage reduced from 50/75/100/125 to 30/60/90/120

  • Sonic Wave manacost increased from 250/360/500 to 250/400/550
RAZOR
  • Strength gain increased from 2.6 to 2.8
  • Agility gain increased from 2.1 to 2.3
PLASMA FIELD
  • Plasma Field cooldown reduced from 14 to 13/12/11/10
STATIC LINK
  • Static Link no longer disarms you nor does invisible attacks through the link, but instead allows you to attack while moving (similar to Windranger). By default it will automatically attack the target linked, but allows you to attack a different target.
STORM SURGE
  • Storm Surge no longer provides 2/4/6/8% AoE movement speed
  • Storm Surge movement speed changed from 6/10/14/18% to 8/12/16/20%
EYE OF THE STORM
  • Eye of the Storm no longer has a passive component
  • Eye of the Storm damage per strike increased from 40/55/70 to 60/75/90
TALENTS
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +180 Eye of the Storm Passive Damage to +1 Eye of the Storm Targets
RUBICK
  • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 110
  • Attack damage spread reduced from 47-57 to 49-55
FADE BOLT
  • Fade Bolt damage reduction changed from a fixed value for heroes and creeps to 10/18/26/34% base damage
  • Fade Bolt damage increased from 80/160/240/320 to 100/175/250/325
  • Fade Bolt manacost reduced from 135/140/145/150 to 120/130/140/150
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +50 Damage to +50 Base Damage
  • Level 15 Talent changed from -80 Fade Bolt Hero Attack to Fade Bolt Steals Hero Damage
SAND KING
CAUSTIC FINALE
  • Caustic Finale has been reworked. Attacking an enemy now places a debuff that slows the enemy by 10/15/20/25% movement speed for 5 seconds. If the target dies during the 5 second debuff, an explosion deals 70/90/110/130 + 10/14/18/22% of the target's max health in a 500 AoE.
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent changed from -30 Epicenter Attack Slow to +20 Epicenter Damage Per Pulse
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +2 Epicenter Pulses to +8% Caustic Finale Slow
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +8 Armor to -2s Burrowstrike Cooldown
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +25 Epicenter Damage to +20 Health regen
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +40 Health Regen to +4 Epicenter Pulses

  • Necromastery no longer grants an extra amount for hero kills

  • Requiem of Souls now releases a wave per 1 soul instead of per 2 souls

TREANT PROTECTOR
LEECH SEED
  • Leech Seed is now an enemy target spell again. Deals 16/32/48/64 damage per pulse and heals allies within 650 range for the same amount. Lasts 5 seconds with a pulse per second. Slows the target enemy for 8/14/20/26%. Cooldown 18/16/14/12. Manacost 110/120/130/140. Cast Range 400
